commit.message: Removed deprecated future imports
Update get_assignments() to guard against AnonymousUsers.

Add functions to determine accessible contexts for some roles.
Add a mixin that uses these functions and can be applied to a ModelViewSet for list actions.
Adds constraints for some packages.
Ignores more pydocstyle violations.
Modify utility functions to be able to handle multiple role assignments via JWTs and database records.

commit.message:
Added support for Django 2.2 -- BOM-1042 (#37)

Relevant JIRA issue can be found here: https://openedx.atlassian.net/browse/BOM-1042

As per Django 2.2 release notes, to use SQLite as a backend we need to have migrations in apps referencing other apps with migrations: https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/3.0/releases/2.2/#miscellaneous

Co-authored-by: Jeremy Bowman <jbowman@edx.org>

verification.payload:
tree d9ec456f3a49ef1db932a6329fcf1fac43c957f0
parent 04549252c51a79ae367ff407a0a4d3be23761549
author Aarif <MrAarif@outlook.com> 1585326054 +0500
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1585326054 -0400

Added support for Django 2.2 -- BOM-1042 (#37)

Relevant JIRA issue can be found here: https://openedx.atlassian.net/browse/BOM-1042

As per Django 2.2 release notes, to use SQLite as a backend we need to have migrations in apps referencing other apps with migrations: https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/3.0/releases/2.2/#miscellaneous

Co-authored-by: Jeremy Bowman <jbowman@edx.org>
